title: 服务器开不了，求解决，附crash报告。。。
author: 雪狼神
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// There are four lights!

Time: 14-10-21 下午12:51
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
        at net.minecraft.world.chunk.storage.AnvilChunkLoader.checkedReadChunkFromNBT_CB(AnvilChunkLoader.java:140)
        at net.minecraft.world.chunk.storage.AnvilChunkLoader.loadChunk__Async_CB(AnvilChunkLoader.java:135)

        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.util.AsynchronousExecutor.skipQueue(AsynchronousExecutor.java:341)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.util.AsynchronousExecutor.getSkipQueue(AsynchronousExecutor.java:300)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.chunkio.ChunkIOExecutor.syncChunkLoad(ChunkIOExecutor.java:12)
        at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.getChunkAt(ChunkProviderServer.java:159)
        at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73158_c(ChunkProviderServer.java:132)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71222_d(MinecraftServer.java:453)

        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:306)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:583)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

淘宝租的服务器，服务器地图我下载不下来。。{:10_524:}
